SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element QuestionnaireResponse

Documentation:

A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the questionnaire being responded to.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • QuestionnaireResponse

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      RelatedRequest

      The proposal, order, or plan that is partly or wholly fulfilled by the performance of this act.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ReferralOrProcedureRequest
      0..*
      Questionnaire

      A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users. Questionnaires provide detailed control over order, presentation, phraseology and grouping to allow coherent, consistent data collection.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(Questionnaire)
      0..1
      FocusOfResponse

      The subject of the questionnaire response. This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc. This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DataType
      FocusOfResponse
      0..1
      DomainResource
      CareContext

      The encounter or episode of care
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CareContext
      0..1
      StatementDateTime

      The point in time when the statement was created.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      StatementDateTime
      0..1
      QuestionnaireResponseRecorder

      The recorder of the information, who received and recorded the answers. For example, the nurse taking a list of medications reported by the patient.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      QuestionnaireResponseRecorder
      0..1
      PersonInformationSource

      The person who provided the information, not necessarily the patient.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      PersonInformationSource
      0..1
      QuestionnaireResponseItem

      Questions and sections within the Questionnaire.
